Thanks for installing the CrewTimeCard The CrewTimeCard is an App that manage checking in and out your company Intuitive interface, easy to use The multiple workplaces can be set All staffs’ working history and current status are provided CrewTimeCard is a module of CrewCloud, which is a portal system for groups(companies).​ So groups(companies)\'s is needed to enter the system and a groups(companies)\'s organization is needed to be configured.​ Click the below link to subscribe your group(company) if you have no id.​ Subscribe
Staff’ List Order
No Internet Connection Please turn on wifi to continue Turn wifi on
The CrewTimeCard is a App which make the members post and save their working status with their current location into the server and thereafter provides the history of the individual working time and the all current members’ working status in a company or a team in real time as well.\n
The working status data stored in the server can be searched and queried on your smartphone or the site, www.crewcloud.net anytime you want.\n
In order to use this App, Someone(we call him ‘site manager’) of your company or team needs to connect the CrewCloud website, www.crewcloud.net , compose your organization(company or team) first and then register your members in advance or send your members the ‘request mail for registration’ so as that the members register by themselves.\n
If you are a just member not the site manager, the you can log in after registering your site directly by yourself through the ‘request mail for registration’ sent from your site manager or after asking your site manager for the your id and password.\n
DaZone Tech., Inc.\n Http://www.dazone.co.kr Email: help@crewcloud.net \n Korea headquarter : 10th fl.,Samho bldg,Yangjae-dong, Seocho-gu, Seoul, KOREA 137-941\n Vietnamese R&D center: 7th fl., Central Park bldg, 208 Nguyễn Trãi, Quận 1 , Hochiminh City, Vietnam
